titleStmt.title: A true and full account of a conference held about religion, between Dr. Tenison and A. Pulton, one of the masters in the Savoy
titleStmt.author: Pulton, A. (Andrew), 1654-1710.

notesStmt.note: An account of the discussions from the view of the Archbishop of Canterbury, Thomas Tenison, is given in A true account of a conference held about religion at London, Septemb. 29, 1687.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
